text: A while back the `julia-latexsub-or-indent` stopped being invoked when tabbbing in a `src julia` or `src jupyter-julia` block (\epsilon <TAB> simply tabs). If I invoke it manually it performs the latexsub as intended, and it works as expected in `.jl` files. Anyone here recognize the issue?

text: The answer to the ‘why’ question is just that it’s a lot of work, for relatively low benefit.

text: One day I was thinking about why we can’t have an editor that’s written in Julia and you can extend it with native Julia code? Like VSCode on steroid...
